projects.title: Wood and Nut
projects.description: The famous wood and nut game retrained in Unity Engine to be more felxible offering the developer to make custom levels.

projects.title: Mutiplayer Racing Game
projects.description: A local multiplayer racing game designed for Egy Assurance in their event. The game has two contestants (and maybe more) to race against each other.

projects.title: Archery VR game
projects.description: A VR experience made for Oculus VR to aim and shoot over targets. You can add branding, time constraint and score for each target.

projects.title: Branded Stack Game
projects.description: The casual stack game but branded with a stacking building theme. The game works on the web with stunning graphics. This game was made for a client in Egypt.

projects.title: Custom Fortune Wheel
projects.description: A Unity devtool for creating and customizing a Fortune Wheel in any game. I worked solo in this project.

projects.title: Scratch-like game
projects.description: A game similar to Scrach (coding website) for children to learn logical thinking by solving simple puzzles with code blocks. This projects features a level editor application to create multiple levels and diffrenet maps to experience

projects.title: Data Algo
projects.description: A program that visualizes core programming topics like data structures and algorithms and code editor inside.

projects.title: Room Builder VR
projects.description: A VR application that simulates an empty room in which a set of 20+ furnitures can be added and modified in place and rotation.This project was made for my VR Diploma associated with 412 Labs for equipment.

projects.title: AR Fighting Game
projects.description: A 1V1 Fighting Game but with AR Experience. The game is Multiplayer using Photon API. The game was made for a crash course in which I participated in its preparation. I worked in a team where I was responsible for the fighting mechanics.

projects.title: Giza System Interview Game
projects.description: A game made to gamify the interview process for Giza Systems. I worked as a solo developer in this game. In this game I used

projects.title: Market Simulator
projects.description: A market game that simulates the buying process. This simulator was requested by one of my clients. The simulator features 50+ shopping items and worked on WebGL flawlessly.
